concept.definition: This resource is still under development.
This resource is ready for normal use.
This resource has been withdrawn or superseded and should no longer be used.

description: The lifecycle status of a Value Set or Concept Map.
name: ConformanceResourceStatus

text.div:
ConformanceResourceStatus

The lifecycle status of a Value Set or Concept Map.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/conformance-resource-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
draft DraftThis resource is still under development.
active ActiveThis resource is ready for normal use.
retired RetiredThis resource has been withdrawn or superseded and should no longer be used.

Additional Language Displays

Codenlru
draftontwerpчерновик
activeactiefактивный
retiredverouderdудалён
